message.name: ERR_TOO_FEW_COLUMNS
message.locale: Failed to create list: too few columns, the minimum number of columns is 1

message.name: ERR_ADD_COLUMN_TITLE_FAILURE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN
message.locale: Failed to add column title: the column '%1s' does not exist

message.name: ERR_SET_COLUMN_WIDTH_FAILURE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN
message.locale: Failed to set column width: the column '%1s' does not exist

message.name: ERR_ADD_CELL_ENTRY_FAILURE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN
message.locale: Adding cell entry failed: the column '%1s' does not exist

message.name: ERR_ADD_CELL_ENTRY_FAILURE_NO_SUCH_ROW
message.locale: Adding cell entry failed: the row '%1s' does not exist

message.name: ERR_ADD_CELL_ENTRY_FAILURE_NO_SUCH_CELL
message.locale: Adding cell entry failed: the cell [%1s,%2s] does not exist
